title: Executive Wellness Package
description: Premium health optimization package designed for busy professionals and high-performers. Combines advanced diagnostic testing with restorative treatments to enhance mental clarity, energy, and long-term vitality.

included.name: Executive Performance IV
included.description: High-dose NAD+, B vitamins, and magnesium for mental clarity, stress reduction, and cellular energy

included.name: Comprehensive Executive Panel
included.description: Advanced analysis including hormone profiles, cardiovascular risk markers, vitamin deficiencies, and stress biomarkers

included.name: Executive Health Consultation
included.description: 60-minute deep dive with senior physician to review results and create personalized action plan
